rdf:Property.rdfs:label: классифицировал
classified
a classifié
χαρακτήρισε
klassifizierte
classificou
分类了
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property records the item to which a type was assigned in an E17 Type Assignment activity. Any instance of a CRM entity may be assigned a type through type assignment. Type assignment events allow a more detailed path from E1 CRM Entity through P41 classified (was classified), E17 Type Assignment, P42 assigned (was assigned by) to E55 Type for assigning types to objects compared to the shortcut offered by P2 has type (is type of).
